name: Aspect Legend
description:
Aspect Legend: Aspect Star 3 is the final game of the Aspect Star trilogy, and following the trend, is an homage to the Nintendo Game Boy. The peace enjoyed by the Empire in the aftermath of Aspect Star 2 has ended as the world is thrown into a new crisis. And in a distant cave, a person wakes up, uncertain of who they are...

Controls:

Arrow keys or WASD: Move character
Spacebar: Shoot or talk to NPCs
Backspace: Reset
Enter: Pause
